ISSUE.TITLE: Search bar isn't visible at decent widths.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY The search bar behaves strangely at smaller widths (still decently wide). ##### ENVIRONMENT * AWX version: Latest * Operating System: Fedora 30 * Web Browser: Chrome ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE Visit a page like the credentials list that has a searchbar, then shrink the width. ##### EXPECTED RESULTS The bar stays visible. ##### ACTUAL RESULTS (ignore weird gif compression in this clip) ![recording-_2_](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19942822/72288091-4b603c80-3616-11ea-9126-704602409c39.gif)
